title: Raymundo Only Invites 5 Show Members To His Wedding + Amy’s Frustrated With The School Pickup Line + Sharna Burgess On Returning To DWTS
itunes:title: Raymundo Only Invites 5 Show Members To His Wedding + Amy’s Frustrated With The School Pickup Line + Sharna Burgess On Returning To DWTS
description:
Bobby checks in with Raymundo on his wedding. Ray says he’s down to 30 people so he came in today to uninvite some people from the show. Amy made the mistake of getting in the wrong lane to pick up her kids and it turned into chaos. She shares her frustration. Plus, Bobby talked to his former DWTS dance partner Sharna Burgess about her return to the show this season!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
